StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetEnlistedPoolBoardMonthlySummary]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@BeginDate date.me ,@OrgId int )
AS
DECLARE @Poolees TABLE (CategoryCode varchar(6) ,GenderCode char )
INSERT INTO @Poolees SELECT n.[CATEGORY_CODE] AS CategoryCode ,mc.[GENDER_CODE] AS GenderCode FROM [dbo].[CONTRACT] c INNER JOIN [dbo].[NWA] n ON c.[NWA_ID] = n.[NWA_ID] INNER JOIN [dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] mc ON n.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = mc.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] WHERE n.[ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID] = @OrgId AND c.[PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE] BETWEEN @BeginDate AND DATEADD(d, -1, DATEADD(m, 1, @BeginDate)) AND C.[DISCHARGE_DATE] IS NULL
ORDER BY c.[PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE]
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Poolees WHERE CategoryCode = 'R' AND GenderCode = 'M') AS RegularMaleNonPriorServiceCount ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Poolees WHERE CategoryCode = 'R' AND GenderCode = 'F') AS RegularFemaleNonPriorServiceCount ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Poolees WHERE CategoryCode = 'G' AND GenderCode = 'M') AS MaleReserveGroundCount ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Poolees WHERE CategoryCode = 'A' AND GenderCode = 'M') AS MaleReserveAirCount ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Poolees WHERE CategoryCode IN ('G', 'A') AND GenderCode = 'F') AS FemaleReserveGroundAndAirCount ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Poolees WHERE CategoryCode = 'P') AS PriorServiceCount
